includes/renderers/flat.h File Reference

Renders a simple map with flat, 2D map tiles. More...

#include "level.h"

Detailed Description

Renders a simple map with flat, 2D map tiles.

Function Documentation

int *  height 
)

Returns the dimensions of a tile generated by a flat renderer.

Parameters:
[out] width The width of the tile
[out] height The height of the tile
Returns:
0 on success, -1 on error

Parameters:

[out] buffer The buffer to draw upon

chunk* renderer_flat_get_chunk ( renderer *  r,
int32_t  coord_x,
int32_t  coord_z 
)

Retrieve a chunk at the given coordinates.

Parameters:
r The renderer whose level's chunks you want
coord_x The X Coordinate of the chunk you want
coord_z The Z Coordinate of the chunk you want
Returns:
The chunk corresponding to the coordinates, or NULL if it is missing or there is an error.

color_map *  map 
)

Creates a new Flat Renderer.

Parameters:
lvl The level to render

Returns:
A new renderer, or NULL on error.
